column2: [[1963]]) is a freelance writer and former child actor (of "[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078611/ Famous Five]" fame)
column3: who has worked as a writer for franchises as Marvel and Dr. Who. He wrote several books relating to [[Peter Jackson]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|movies]].

column2: it starts with the conceptual art
column3: the earliest sketches and drawings done back in 1996/7. Then it goes on through the [[Weta Workshop|Weta]] stuff
column5: maquettes and everything right up to the commencement of filming - and beyond. I deliberately wanted to avoid focussing on the actual finished film itself as [[Brian Sibley]]'s book covered that so well.|Gary Russell

column1: * [[2002]]: ''[[The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Art of The Return of the King]]''
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Art of The Lord of the Rings (film book)|The Art of The Lord of the Rings]]''
* [[2007]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Official Stage Companion]]''
